entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:52 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Lake Ontario. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
